scripts.build:py: maturin build --manifest-path packages/lib/Cargo.toml -o build/lib --interpreter python3.9 && pip3 install build/lib/lib-0.0.1-cp39-none-win_amd64.whl --force-reinstall
scripts.build:py-prod: maturin build --manifest-path packages/lib/Cargo.toml -o build/lib --release --interpreter python3.9 && pip3 install build/lib/lib-0.0.1-cp39-none-win_amd64.whl --force-reinstall
scripts.build: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-C embed-bitcode -C target-cpu=native" cargo build --release
